casebody.data:
HARRAH
v.
MIKE ENYART & SONS, INC. 2019-0186 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 3, 2019

APPEAL NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appellant's motion for stay denied.

O'CONNOR, C.J., would deny appellant's motion for stay as moot.

FISCHER, J., dissents and would accept the cause and grant appellant's motion for stay.
